metadata.title: Yangprom Long Spaghetti Straps Ball Gown Satin Prom Dresses with Pockets
features: ❤Material: High quality satin, fully lined in polyester and skin-friendly.Built-in Bra, Corset closure

❤Classic Satin Prom Dresses Features: A-Line, Spaghetti Straps, Satin ,Sleeveless, with Pockets, Backless, Sleeveless, Open Back,Corset/Criss Back, Plus Size, Built In Bra, Floor Length Long, Empire Waist, Long formal dresses for women，You will receive many compliments on this beautiful dress!
❤Size Notice:Choose this beautiful prom dress, please check the Size Chart on Left Column before you order, Do Not reference Amazon Size chart. If you are not sure the size, please email us.

❤Long Gowns CUSTOM-MADE SERVICE: We could do Custom Size for Free, you just need to us your Exact Measurements, including Bust, Waist, Hips, Natural Height, Heels Height. Note: We not accept Custom Made Size return and refund. Please carefully check your detailed size.

❤This Backless Prom Dresses Delivery time:: The Standard Shipping takes about 12-20 days to be delivered, the Expedited Shipping takes about 6-12 days. If you need the dress urgently, please email us and we will make the rush order for you.

❤Occasions: This amazing long prom dresses 2021 is suitable as bridesmaid dresses for women, formal dresses , prom dresses with pockets, v neck evening party gowns, dresses for wedding party, special occasions,long bridesmaid dress, Fully lined, homecoming dresses for girls, ceremony/celebrity, banquet. Crowd: spaghetti prom dresses for Women/girls,Junior,Lady
description: Welcome to our online store! from here you can find your dresses. Our business is mainly for prom,evening,wedding,homecoming,bridesmaid dresses and so on . Any questions,pls feel free to contact us!It Is Made Of High Quality Materials,Durable Enought For Your Daily Wearing.Great For Party,Daily,Beach,Prom,homecoming,Evening,Birthday,Anniversary,Engagement,Wedding Party etc,I Am Sure You Will Like It!Customized Request: please refer to the image of How to Measure and fill in the following blank and inform us via email after you placed the order within 12 hours.1.Full Bust:_____ inch or ___ cm2.Waist:_____ inch or ___ cm3.Hips: _____ inch or ___ cm4.Height: _____inch or ___ cm5. Hollow to Floor:___inch or ___cm6.The height of your high heel shoes: _____inch or ___ cmNOTE: The dress doesn't include any accessory show in the picture, such as wedding veil,gloves, shawl, crown,necklace,etc .The real color of the item may be slightly different caused by many factors such as brightness of your monitor and light brightness.Seller Return Policy :1.If you have any problem after receive this dress Please contact with us with 7 days, we are sure to reply to you within 12 hours. ^^2.all returned items must be in brand-new condition, with no smell of perfume or any other trace of worn, unused and with original tags and packaging.3.requests to return items due to quality issues, damage during shipping, color/style/size error must be accompanied by photos or other evidence that clearly shows the problem with the item received.Washing care:1.Cold Water Hand Wash Recommended2.Do not bleach3.Hang to dryThank you for your trust!!! Have a happy shopping journey. ^^
